item.title: Lil Nas X Pleads Not Guilty On Felony Charges, Bail Set at $75,000
item.description: After a stint in jail over the weekend, the musician’s defense attorneys said after his arraignment hearing that they expect he’ll be released on bail later Monday.

item.title: Lil Nas X to Remain Jailed Through the Weekend Following Arrest and Hospitalization
item.description: Authorities say he’ll remain behind bars until Monday, and a source close to the rapper tells The Hollywood Reporter that he hasn’t been allowed visitors yet.
